name: runnable-hermes
description: Runnable job queuing system management. Publishing. Subscribing.

scripts.test: npm run lint; DEBUG=Hermes* NODE_PATH=./ lab -c
scripts.test-cov: rm coverage/coverage.html; NODE_PATH=./ lab -c -r html > coverage/coverage.html; open -a 'Google Chrome' coverage/coverage.html

author: Casey Flynn <cflynn.us@gmail.com>
